titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, September 30, 1947

mods.note: "Este Cate" Indian Club, Oklahoma Baptist University (Shawnee, Oklahoma)
mods.tableOfContents: Victor Kaneubbe (English). Piano Solo - Betty Hilton "Clare de Lune". Club Information - Joan Fixico. Vocal Solo - Victor Kaneubbe "God is Love". Vocal Quartette - "Wandering Child" (Group Members: Allen Morris, Kenny Walkingstick, James Payne); Songs by Group: "Roads of Light", "May He Depend on You". Talk and Sermon and Prayer by: Kenny Walkingstick, "A Call to Indian Youth".
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
